patthana8.14:1.1_0: Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana8.14:1.1_1: nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo
patthana8.14:2.1: Nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.14:3.1_0: Noāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavañca
patthana8.14:3.1_1: nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavañca nanoāsavañca
patthana8.14:3.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.14:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
